1.0.name: wordpress/multi-color
1.0.description: Beautiful, sleek theme with 6 color options. 5 different sidebar layouts to choose from. Two blog styles: Standard and Magazine available. Tabbed content widget ready to use. Custom background setting available. Custom smileys. Mobile friendly layout. Valid XHTML/CSS and powered by WordPress 2.8 and higher. More updates to come soon.
